body_html: I think that a reasonable approach would be to expose APIs to get versions and if these libraries were loaded or not, it would be the cleaner option here in my opinion, instead of just dumping log messages. If someone wants to print something, he can get all the info from API.

body: I think that a reasonable approach would be to expose APIs to get versions and if these libraries were loaded or not, it would be the cleaner option here in my opinion, instead of just dumping log messages. If someone wants to print something, he can get all the info from API.
